director.name: Dr. Binod Kumar Pankaj
message: At Paramount Grove, we believe that every child is a unique individual with the potential to achieve greatness. Our mission is to provide an environment that nurtures not just academic excellence, but also emotional, social, and moral development. With our XSEED-powered curriculum and dedicated faculty, we are committed to fostering a love for learning and preparing our students for the challenges of the future

We place a strong emphasis on holistic development by balancing academics with co-curricular activities, life skills, and values. We aim to create compassionate, confident, and responsible individuals who will contribute positively to society.

As the Director, I am proud of our school’s achievements and progress over the years. Together, with the support of parents and the dedication of our teachers, we continue to provide an inspiring and supportive environment for every student.
Thank you for being a part of our journey. Let’s continue to learn, grow, and achieve together.
